Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I was just diagnosed yesterday with breast cancer, 5 cm lump in breast and some in lymph nodes.  To say it was a shock is an understatement, it’s so surreal, it doesn’t feel real yet.   I have still to get scan to see if it’s spread yet, but have already been told they will be starting with chemo after new year. My daughter is only 5 and as you can’t imagine my head is spinning a million miles a hour with all the scenarios that could happen.  I’m just lost at the moment. xx
Posts.Title: Not sure what I’m doing
